scripts.test:functional-headless: yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --config functional-test/playwright.config.ts --project chromium --reporter=html --grep-invert @work-allocation
scripts.test:functional-head: yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --config functional-test/playwright.config.ts --project chromium --headed --reporter=html --grep-invert @work-allocation --grep @wip-test
scripts.highLevelDataSetup: echo 'bash bin/before-data-setup-step.sh benefit $1 && ./gradlew highLevelDataSetup --args=$1 && sh bin/after-data-setup-step.sh' > ./temp.sh && sh ./temp.sh
scripts.test:smoke: echo no tests run at this step
scripts.test:preview: PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_REPORT=playwright-report PW_TEST_HTML_REPORT_OPEN=never yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --config functional-test/playwright.config.ts --project chromium --reporter=html --grep-invert @work-allocation --grep @preview-pipeline
scripts.test:preview-hearings: PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_REPORT=playwright-report PW_TEST_HTML_REPORT_OPEN=never yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --config functional-test/playwright.config.ts --project chromium --reporter=html --grep-invert @work-allocation --grep '(?=.*@preview-pipeline) | (?=.*@hearings-enabled-test)'
scripts.test:aat: PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_REPORT=playwright-report PW_TEST_HTML_REPORT_OPEN=never yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --config functional-test/playwright.config.ts --project chromium --reporter=html --grep-invert @work-allocation --grep @master-pipeline
scripts.test:fullfunctional: PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_REPORT=playwright-report PW_TEST_HTML_REPORT_OPEN=never yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --config functional-test/playwright.config.ts --project chromium --reporter=html --grep-invert @work-allocation --grep @nightly-pipeline
